lead_paragraph: U.S. coach Jurgen Klinsmann realizes full well that a strong Copa America run on home soil could mean much to this country hosting another World Cup.

headline.print_headline: US Looks to Build World Cup Buzz at Home in Copa America
headline.main: US Looks to Build World Cup Buzz at Home in Copa America

snippet: U.S. coach Jurgen Klinsmann realizes full well that a strong Copa America run on home soil could mean much to this country hosting another World Cup....
